summary: This document is an email chain forwarding a conference flyer. The email is from Jessica St. Germaine, a staff attorney at the Crime Victims Center, promoting a virtual conference on April 15, 2021, and includes a forwarded message with the flyer attachment. It is marked as a privileged inter-office communication.

persons.name: Jessica St. Germaine
persons.context: She is the sender of the forwarded email, promoting a conference flyer as a staff attorney at the Crime Victims Center.

events.title: Virtual Conference
events.description: A conference is scheduled for April 15, 2021, featuring a workshop, as promoted in the email flyer.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated March 17, 2021, forwarding a flyer for a virtual conference on April 15, 2021.
Jessica St. Germaine, a staff attorney at the Crime Victims Center, is the sender promoting the conference.
The email is marked as a privileged and confidential inter-office/intra-agency communication not subject to FOIL disclosure.
